{#Cpu}

### Graphe de performances processeur

```{r, echo=FALSE} 

library('reshape2')
library('ggplot2')

# ---- CPU -----

cpu = read.csv(file="cpu.csv",head=TRUE,sep=";")

initialTimestamp <- cpu[1, "time"]
time = cpu[["time"]] - initialTimestamp

cols = c("usr.all",
         "nice.all",
         "sys.all",
         "iowait.all",
         "irq.all",
         "soft.all",
         "steal.all",
         "guest.all",
         "gnice.all")
            
cpuAll = data.frame(time, cpu[,cols])
cpuAll = melt(cpuAll, id.vars="time")

ggplot(cpuAll, aes(time, value)) + geom_line(aes(colour=variable))

```
